summary:
**ASX Listing Application (Appendix 1A)**  
- **Entity Name:** Broken Hill Mines Limited (formerly Coolabah Metals Limited)  
- **Securities to be Quoted:**  
  - 268,682,209 Fully Paid Ordinary Shares  
  - 6,287,996 Quoted Options (CBHOA)  
  - 9,368,916 Quoted Options (CBHO)  
- **No material capital or operational details disclosed.**  

(Note: No trading, capital raising, or financial data provided—strictly a listing application.)
